about_the_game:
Trying to survive in space can be a handful.


Space Smack! is a 1 to 4 player controller only party game. Play with your friends locally or online with Steam Remote Play. Smack your friends and relish in your victories as you compete in a variety of chaotic minigames.

Key features:

  • 15 exciting minigames to play and challenge
  • Smack your friends or play alone!
  • Chaos, competitiveness, and SABOTAGE
  • Tournament and freeplay mode
  • Race, score points, and survive to become victorious!
  • Use Steam Remote Play to play online with your friends

Notes:

Space Smack! is published by SMU Guildhall and was developed by a small graduate student team over a development cycle of approximately 4 months.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600K, AMD 2600X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770, AMD Radeon 560; 4GB VRAM or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum average sustained frame rate of 30fps or better achieved on hardware combinations in this min-spec range. Your experience may vary based on a variety of factors. Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-5930K or AMD 3600X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or better; AMD Radeon 580 or better; 4GB VRAM or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game runs well on most common gaming configurations within the past 4-5 years (GTX 1060-era and beyond). Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.

short_description: Space Smack! is a 1 to 4 player party game exploding with chaos and sabotage. Enter into the vast expanse of space and clash in a variety of minigames. In this controller-only game, cooperate or undermine your friends to become victorious!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
